description: Detects usage of the Get-ADUser cmdlet to collect user information
false_positives: Legitimate admin scripts may use the same technique, it's better to exclude specific computers or users who execute these commands or scripts often
name: User Discovery Via Get-ADUser Cmdlet
query: ((process.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll")) AND (process.command_line.text:*Get\-ADUser\ * AND process.command_line.text:*\ \-Filter\ \*))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
